___directory.description: The directory name to create the app in.

___inlineStyle.description: Specifies if the style will be in the ts file.

___prefix.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

___minimal.description: Create a minimal app (no test structure, inline styles/templates).

___style.description: The file extension to be used for style files.
